query: WITH entities AS (SELECT credit_facility_id, idx, id FROM disbursements WHERE ((credit_facility_id = $1) AND (COALESCE((idx, id) > ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY idx ASC, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: DisbursementId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN disbursement_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.idx asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
